text: Off on a lobster safari

So we’re out here with Carl pulling up some
lobster pots

to see what we’ve caught
they come out here about two times a week
so let’s see what we got

So we’ve got a minimum size
which is the main rule

so the minimum size has got to be 87mm
from the eye socket to the back of the carapace

so he’s out it’s got to be touching
the back of the carapace
you see he’s about 1mm out

so comparable sizes but see the tail?
see the difference in the tail?

It’s thicker
I do actually

What this female is basically between the
mating and the hatching

So they’re new eggs they’ve been laid
probably in the last two, three weeks

they’re very black, they’re small
yeah

she’ll have them on there now, she’ll
look after them now, they won’t hatch

until May or June so she’s got them for
9 months

So on this cutter claw one of those bands,
skinny one

and on the stronger crusher claw
we put a more meaty band on

What a great day learning about lobster here
in Wales

I learned so many different things
my mind is just bursting with all the information

I learned
I highly recommend to do this

you learn a lot, see a lot of great things
and hey you know what?
it’s a bucket list item
